comments.body: If your budget is 50k then go for integrated graphics you wont be able to find a good laptop with dgpu in this segment
I've found some laptops with RTX 2050 , should I prefer those *gaming laptops* or take normal ones ?
bruh check the faq in the pinned content in the subreddit
Oh sry didn't see, thanks a lot ðŸ¥²ðŸ™Œ
